EmailTemplate.description: Email sent on Final Determination Denial
EmailTemplate.name: Toolkit Application Denied
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit: Your Application Has Been Declined
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name};
Thank you for submitting an application to participate in the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit. Unfortunately, your application failed to meet the U.S. Department of Commerce's criteria for acceptance. If you feel this assessment was made in error, or would like to provide additional justification for your company's participation, please complete the following steps:
1. Log in to your Assistance Dashboard (https://www.export.gov/dashboard). 2. Click on the link to your application. 3. Enter a comment in the “Attachments & Comments” box. 4. Click “Add” to communicate directly with a member of the {!Case.RecordType} Team.
Thank you. The {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit Team
